description: This file contains utility functions for file reading, property extraction, file type checking, recursive file and directory searching, and property expansion within strings. It is part of the Utils namespace and primarily provides inline functions for external use.

methods.name: bool readPropertyFromFile(const char * filename,const string & property,string & propertyValue)
methods.description: Reads a property value from a specified file, searches for the property key, and handles recursive expansion if the property value starts with '$'.

methods.name: bool readFileContent(const char * filename,string & content)
methods.description: Reads the entire content of a specified file into a string.

methods.name: bool isRegularFile(const string & path)
methods.description: Checks whether a given path corresponds to a regular file.

methods.name: bool searchFilesRec(std::vector<std::string> & pathList,unsigned int currentDepth,const std::list<string> & exclusions,string & result)
methods.description: Recursively searches directories for files matching patterns with support for exclusions and result accumulation, capped at 10 results.

methods.name: bool searchFiles(string & inputPath,int maxDepth,int minDepth,const std::list<string> & exclusions,string & result)
methods.description: Initiates a recursive search for files starting from an input path with specified depth limits and exclusions.

methods.name: bool ExpandPropertiesInString(const char * input,const char * filePath,string & expandedString)
methods.description: Processes a string to replace variables (prefixed with '$') with their corresponding property values read from a property file.

ctags.signature: (string & inputPath,int maxDepth,int minDepth,const std::list<string> & exclusions,string & result)
